meaningMnemonic: You have only <kanji>one</kanji> <kanji>life</kanji> so do everything with lots of <kanji>eager</kanji>ness (懸命). Do everything <vocabulary>with all one's might</vocabulary>. Go <vocabulary>all out</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: Everything except the 生 uses the readings you learned with the kanji, and you learned this reading of 生 when you learned 一生. You've really been going <vocabulary>all out</vocabulary> to learn these readings!
